definition: to have high standards but little ability/to be fastidious but incompetent (idiom)
eye/small hole/crux (of a matter)/CL:隻|只[zhi1],雙|双[shuang1]/classifier for big hollow things (wells, stoves, pots etc)
high/tall/above average/loud/your (honorific)
surname Gao
hand/(formal) to hold/person engaged in certain types of work/person skilled in certain types of work/personal(ly)/convenient/classifier for skill/CL:雙|双[shuang1],隻|只[zhi1]
low/beneath/to lower (one's head)/to let droop/to hang down/to incline

sentences.english: All the ones we have seen here have four-star abilities with five-star abilities.
sentences.chinese: 我們在此看到的所有人都是些眼高手低之輩。

sentences.english: People sometimes bite off more than they can chew.
sentences.chinese: 有時人們胃口太大，眼高手低。

sentences.english: The fourth step, do not Yangaoshoudi.
Hey Ken , I think your eyes are bigger than your stomach.
sentences.chinese: 嗨，K，我覺的你是眼高手低，可吃不了這麼多的。

sentences.english: You said we have grandiose aims but puny abilities, And we won't know the reality is cruel…
sentences.chinese: 你說我們這樣是眼高手低，不知曉現實的殘酷。

sentences.english: Setting ambitious plans without the ability to execute them will only result in performances that are unsatisfactory.
sentences.chinese: 眼高手低的結果，只能是不倫不類的演出。

definition: to bite off more than one can chew (idiom)/to aim too high
to think highly of oneself (idiom); giving oneself airs/arrogant and self-important
satisfied just to get through (idiom); to muddle through/without high ambitions, but getting by
to think too much of oneself/self-important/arrogant
lit. the next mountain looks taller (idiom); fig. not satisfied with one's current position/the grass is always greener on the other side of the fence
pinyin: zhe4 shan1 wang4 zhe5 na4 shan1 gao1

definition: to take things as they are (idiom)/to leave a situation as it is/to be happy with the status quo
(idiom) to blame the gods and accuse others
can't reach the high or accept the low (idiom); not good enough for a high post, but too proud to take a low one
pinyin: gao1 bu4 cheng2 di1 bu4 jiu4

definition: to think of oneself as high and pure (idiom); smug and self-righteous/holier-than-thou
to think highly of oneself (idiom); giving oneself airs/arrogant and self-important
to be shortsighted
to talk big/to sound off/bombastic/grandiloquent
to have achieved nothing/to be a total failure/to get nowhere
to have no aspirations (idiom)/unambitious
to idle/to waste time
high in score but low in ability (as a result of teaching to the test)
